thread.title: Newell Plans to Shed Product Lines Including Rawlings, Goody

author: Cara Lombardo
title: Newell Plans to Shed Product Lines Including Rawlings, Goody

organizations.name: newell plans to shed product lines including rawlings

text:
After spending billions of dollars to scoop up rivals and build a conglomerate of household products, Newell Brands Inc. is reversing course, looking to unload brands and close half its factories.
The company sells Sharpie markers, Elmers glue, Rubbermaid containers and Graco baby strollers. It more than doubled in size in 2016 when it acquired Jarden Corp., adding Yankee Candle, Mr. Coffee machines and Coleman camping gear to its portfolio. 
...
